thread.title: Illegal Immigration Surged In August, Illegal Families Set For Worst Year On Record
thread.title_full: Illegal Immigration Surged In August, Illegal Families Set For Worst Year On Record

author: McPartland
title: Illegal Immigration Surged In August, Illegal Families Set For Worst Year On Record
text:
Illegal Immigration Surged In August, Illegal Families Set For Worst Year On Record   AP 
By Stephen Dinan - The Washington Times 
Border Patrol agents are getting “hammered” by a new surge of illegal immigration into Texas, the agency’s chief told Congress on Tuesday as new numbers showed a massive influx in August, defying the usual pattern of a late-summer slowdown.
